website_summaries.verdict: Golfers who are on the hunt for a reliable golf shoe during winter or extremely harsh weather can count on the Adidas Climaproof BOA. Thanks to the waterproof upper and high top construction, this shoe extremely guards the foot, giving robust protection. The dial fastening system serves as a cherry on top for this pair for being convenient and, most importantly, effective lacing. Those who were able to test it out give their seal of approval despite minor adversities.
pros: A large number of purchasers laud the Adidas Climacool BOA for its extremely waterproof upper
Moreover, because of its welded tongue on the shoe, there's no way that water can seep through
Playing on frigid weather becomes possible for this shoe, according to many users
A high percentage of testers highly acknowledge the fastening system
It gives the convenience of quick lacing
Several purchasers cannot deny that the ankle support is an awesome feature of this Adidas golf shoe
A few individuals make a statement that despite being a golf boot, it is surprisingly lightweight
The spiked sole magnificently holds both the grass and mat, says some golfers
According to a small percentage of reviewers, the replaceable spikes lengthens the lifespan of this gear
One is elated since this pair cleans up easily that it looks new every round
cons: A handful of buyers are expressing their problems with the high-top construction of this shoe
It tends to rub on the ankles, especially at first wear
One of the golfers does not recommend this to people with high arches

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best golf boot ever.
customer_reviews.text: Great winter golf wear, very comfortable, completely waterproof, easy to clean, and the no lace fastening system is a god send in taking the boots off no wet laces to wrestle with..Good ankle support and good grip.the best winter boots I have ever had.Shop around and get these at the right price and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P J CLAYTON

customer_reviews.title: Small but good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but buy two sizes too small, not just one.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Law

customer_reviews.title: Golf Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes.. Feet nice and warn and more importantly DRY. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to order at least one size up
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I went up a whole size to a 10. They still feel very snug!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Wear a little small
customer_reviews.text: These were for my husband and he loves them. He says they are extremely comfortable. He did buy a size larger than he normally would because someone had left feedback that they wore small. He is very pleased with them and found them comfortable right from the first time he wore them.
customer_reviews.author: chrissie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 9 too small. Easy to return. Size 10 perfect. Very comfortable and most important, dry feet after a soggy round.
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not 100% waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Worn twice. Comfortable. Feet were not 100 dry on both occasions which is disappointing. Like the mechanism for tightening laces, just hope its robust and durable over the longer period.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonteaw

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable golf boot and yes it keeps your feet dry. If you have wide feet get the next size up
customer_reviews.author: Vincent C

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and keep my usually very cold feet warm and dry
customer_reviews.author: The Bluesman

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size above normal
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the boots - just too narrow, so have returned and ordered a size bigger
customer_reviews.author: wyn4latics

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, warm, well made golf boots. Arrived quickly. I am delighted with them.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boot and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's early days but so far so good. Comfortable and neat looking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent although sizing is definitely an issue. At Least one side bigger than you usually order. I had to send mine back but the process was simple for getting a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: robert barber

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase for winter golf I've made. Also love the BOA, and will buy those from now on
customer_reviews.author: donald

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Feet have been bone dry even whilst playing in heavy rain
customer_reviews.author: matthew salmons

customer_reviews.title: Great product great service
customer_reviews.text: Product arrive early and exactly as I expected. Great service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Climaproof Boa Golf Shoes
product_meta.description: adidas Mens climaproof BOA Golf ShoesWeatherproof Golf Shoes Help You Dominate The CourseKeeping your feet comfortable is essential to a dedicated golfer like you. You're not going to miss your tee time for any type of weather so you need the adidas climaproof BOA spiked golf shoes. These shoes are made with adidas climaproof protection. They're totally waterproof and guaranteed for two years to keep your feet dry and comfortable with maximum performance and easy-to-clean lightweight microfiber leather uppers. The BOA Closure System is located on the center of the tongue for easy adjustment and a custom fit that never comes loose. A bounce foam midsole runs the full length of the shoe for cushioning, comfort and energy return with every step.adidas Mens climaproof BOA Golf Shoes features: * Built on the Competition wide last with a slightly rounded toe and wider forefoot for increased volume, comfort, stability and natural fit * Lightweight microfiber leather uppers feature climaproof protection for dry comfort in any weather * Modern, athletic mid-cut design features a soft articulated solar and tongue for added comfort, support and flexibility * Powercage saddle connected by soft wire through a 360LOOP guide to the BOA Closure System for greater power and stability * L6 BOA Closure System is located on the top center of the tongue for easy adjustability that never comes loose and locks in your exact fit * Full length bounce foam in the midsole for exceptional cushioning, comfort and energy return in every step * fitfoam sock liner delivers great cushioning, support and comfort in the shoe * 6 spike TPU outsole features strategically placed secondary traction lugs for even greater grip and stability * Low profile thintech cleats use the PINS receptacle and offer increased stability, traction and green-friendly grip * 2 Year Waterproof Warranty * 90 Day Comfort Guarantee
feature_bullets: Waterproof climaproof keeps your feet dry and comfortable; boost is our most responsive cushioning ever
6-spike TPU outsole construction with strategically placed secondary lugs for tour-proven grip and stability;
Microfibre synthetic leather upper for comfort, and soft feel
The more energy you give, the more you get; BOUNCE foam in forefoot provides great response and helps deliver more power at swing impact
A Boa closure system allows you to personalise the fit
